title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.5 - Littering; polluting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.5 - Littering; polluting

State Regulations
(a) No
person shall litter or cause littering on any part of the authority
facilities. (b) No person shall
litter, pollute, or cause littering or pollution of the Hudson

River. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
